channel.title: How could I edit noteable data?
channel.description:
How could I edit noteable data? What program (s) are needed/suggested. Does it just have a bunch of id-s in a row or is there something more in these? I tried using Notepad++ witch worked fine for [b]STACKABLE[/b] but not for [b]NOTEABLE[/b] .dat file.
I need this to find the unnoteable items and fix some i haven't found yet.

item.title: How could I edit noteable data?

item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

Nvm… i figured it out how to myself.

Read full topic

item.title: How could I edit noteable data?
item.dc:creator: @illslayu illslayu
item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

This is like an MSN conversation log already: 2 people both unwilling to give up.
I’m not here to ask about adding those items client-side, i need/want a program that can edit noteable data so i won’t have to recreate it my self.

Read full topic
item.source: How could I edit noteable data?

item.title: How could I edit noteable data?
item.dc:creator: @DUWmaster DUWmaster
item.description:
@DUWmaster wrote:

They are custom items as they are not in a normal 317. But they are loaded in the cache. But you’ll need to add the codes into class8 to make it noteable.

Read full topic
item.source: How could I edit noteable data?

item.title: How could I edit noteable data?
item.dc:creator: @illslayu illslayu
item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

Yes, using 317. No there not customs, otherwise they would be in ItemDef/Class8 .java. I belive that the last item ID in 317 cache was 7955 and dagannoth-related stuff (Including these i mentioned above) are ID-s under 7000. Anyways enough about that, i’m looking for a program that can read & edit noteable data.
Once agin, thanks for your reply.

Read full topic
item.source: How could I edit noteable data?
